law.catch_line: It shall be the duty of the Governor, semiannually (and oftener, if he deem it expedient) to examine...
law.text: It shall be the duty of the Governor, semiannually (and oftener, if he deem it expedient) to examine under oath the Treasurer and Comptroller of the State on all matters pertaining to their respective offices; and inspect and review their Bank and other Account Books.
